Journal.Title: Zhongguo yi xue ke xue yuan xue bao. Acta Academiae Medicinae Sinicae
Journal.ISOAbbreviation: Zhongguo Yi Xue Ke Xue Yuan Xue Bao

Article.ArticleTitle: [Research Progress of CD4+T Cells-mediated Regulation of Neuroinflammation Involved in Neurodegenerative Diseases].

Abstract.AbstractText: Neurodegenerative diseases are associated with neuroinflammation,oxidative stress,and aging,which can lead to cognitive and motor dysfunctions.Recent studies suggest that the development of neurodegenerative diseases is related to adaptive immunity,in which CD4+T cells are involved as adaptive immune cells.Through different pathways,CD4+T cells differentiate into effector and regulatory subsets,which may have different effects on the progression of neurodegenerative diseases such as Alzheimer's disease,Parkinson's disease,multiple sclerosis,and amyotrophic lateral sclerosis.Here,we review the role and research progress of CD4+T cells in neurodegenerative diseases.
